# update(bufferPointer:)

**Instance Method**

Incrementally updates the hash function with the contents of the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func update(bufferPointer: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
```

## Parameters

- **bufferPointer**: A pointer to the next block of data for the ongoing digest calculation.

## Discussion

Call this method one or more times to provide data to the hash function in blocks. After providing the last block of data, call the [doc://com.apple.CryptoKit/documentation/CryptoKit/SHA384/finalize()] method to get the computed digest. Don’t call the update method again after finalizing the hash function.



## Computing a hash iteratively

- **init()**: Creates a SHA384 hash function.
- **finalize()**: Finalizes the hash function and returns the computed digest.
